metadata.title: CVE-2024-50224 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:spi: spi-fsl-dspi: Fix crash when not using GPIO chip selectAdd check for the return value of spi_get_csgpiod() to avoid passing a NULLpointer to gpiod_direction_output(), preventing a crash when GPIO chipselect is not used.Fix below crash:[    4.251960] Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtualaddress
